mapper.insert: insert into users (userEmail, userPassword, userName, userSex, userNumb, userAdr) values (#{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userSex}, #{userNumb}, #{userAdr});
mapper.select: select * from users where userEmail = #{userEmail} limit 1
select * from users where userEmail = #{userEmail} and userPassword = #{userPassword} limit 1
